title: Вітя
overview: Viktor Viktorovich Vasilenko works as a mechanic at his father's service station, but his real passion is psychology. Thanks to his earnings at the workshop, he was able to enroll in the correspondence department of the Poltava Forestry Institute, where he received a degree in psychology. Vitya dreams of gaining a deeper understanding of himself and helping others find inner harmony. Without hesitation, he begins counseling people right on the job. Every day, residents come to him with their anxieties, complexes, and prejudices, and Vitya tries to help everyone.
